description: If the SBC contains blueprint information it includes the position of blocks and capabilities of the ship, station, rover, or other construct. If the SBC contains sound definitions, it includes the location of one or more sound files played during gameplay, volume levels, if it loops, and other information.
SBC files containing descriptions of worlds are stored in the following directory with several other files:
You can open and modify an SBC file using a plain text editor or XML editor. However, you may need to rename the ".sbc" extension to ".xml" in order to open the file in a plain text or XML editor.
